ui.title: Puja Booking
ui.description: Comfortable stays near the temple for a peaceful pilgrimage experience

poojas.title: Mangal Dosh Nivaran Pooja
poojas.subtitle: To mitigate the malefic effects of Mars in the birth chart
poojas.description: This remedial puja neutralizes the negative influence of Mangal (Mars) in the horoscope, which can cause marital discord, aggression, and delays in success. Performed with Vedic mantras to restore balance.
benefits: Mitigates health issues related to Mars
poojas.important_note: Wear red clothing during the puja for enhanced effects
not_suitable_for: Those without Mangal Dosha in chart
poojas.priest_qualification: Vedic priests with expertise in planetary remedies
what_to_expect: Personalized consultation with priest before puja
Traditional Vedic rituals performed with authentic mantras
Live video streaming available for remote participants
Prasad and sacred items delivered to your address
Detailed puja completion certificate with photos

dos: Carry your birth chart if available

booking_process: Select your preferred date and time
poojas.cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 48 hours before scheduled time. 50% refund for cancellations within 24-48 hours.

customer_reviews.name: Rajesh Kumar
customer_reviews.comment: The puja was performed with great devotion. I felt positive changes within weeks.

customer_reviews.name: Priya Sharma
customer_reviews.comment: Excellent service! The priests were knowledgeable and the entire process was smooth.

poojas.title: Kaal Sarp Dosh Nivaran
poojas.subtitle: To remove obstacles caused by Kaal Sarp Yoga
poojas.description: This puja pacifies the effects of Kaal Sarp Yoga, a planetary alignment causing delays, struggles, and misfortunes. It invokes Naga deities to clear karmic blockages.
poojas.frequency: Once or during major life transitions
poojas.important_note: Provide accurate birth details for personalized rituals
what_to_expect: Sacred Naga deity worship with traditional offerings
Personalized mantra chanting based on your chart
Protective yantra and blessed items for home

dos: Wear comfortable white or light-colored clothes
Stay hydrated during the long ceremony
Participate in mantra chanting if possible
donts: Do not consume onion/garlic 3 days before
Refrain from cutting hair/nails before puja

booking_process: Consult with astrologer for puja date
poojas.cancellation_policy: Cancellation allowed up to 7 days before puja date. 30% processing fee applies for cancellations.

customer_reviews.name: Amit Patel
customer_reviews.comment: Life-changing experience! The obstacles I faced for years started clearing up.

customer_reviews.name: Sunita Reddy
customer_reviews.comment: Very powerful puja. The priests were highly experienced and dedicated.

poojas.title: Pitra Dosh Nivaran
poojas.subtitle: To appease ancestors and remove ancestral curses
poojas.description: This ritual addresses Pitra Dosha, caused by ancestral dissatisfaction, leading to family disputes, financial losses, and health issues. It honors ancestors through Vedic offerings.
poojas.important_note: Perform with family members for maximum benefit
poojas.seasonal_offer: Free ancestral chart analysis during Pitru Paksha

poojas.title: Naadi Dosh Nivaran
poojas.subtitle: To resolve compatibility issues in marriage
poojas.description: This puja mitigates Naadi Dosha in horoscope matching, which can cause health issues, infertility, or marital discord. It invokes divine blessings for harmony.
poojas.important_note: Both partners should participate
poojas.seasonal_offer: Free compatibility analysis during Valentine’s week
poojas.priest_qualification: Vedic priests with expertise in matchmaking

poojas.title: Shani Shanti Pooja
poojas.subtitle: To pacify the effects of Saturn’s influence
poojas.description: This puja neutralizes the malefic effects of Shani (Saturn), which can cause delays, hardships, and health issues. It invokes Lord Shani for blessings of discipline and success.
poojas.frequency: During Shani transits or Sade Sati
poojas.important_note: Offer mustard oil to Shani idol post-puja
poojas.seasonal_offer: Free Shani report during Shani Jayanti

poojas.title: Rahu Shanti Pooja
poojas.subtitle: To mitigate the malefic effects of Rahu
poojas.description: This puja pacifies Rahu’s shadow influence, which causes confusion, addiction, and sudden setbacks. It aligns Rahu’s energy for success and intuition.
poojas.important_note: Avoid non-vegetarian food during preparation

poojas.title: Ketu Shanti Pooja
poojas.subtitle: To neutralize Ketu’s malefic effects
poojas.description: This ritual mitigates Ketu’s influence, which can cause spiritual confusion, detachment, and health issues. It invokes Ketu’s blessings for spiritual growth and clarity.
poojas.important_note: Maintain silence post-puja for 12 hours

poojas.title: Grah Dosh Nivaran
poojas.subtitle: To balance all planetary influences
poojas.description: This comprehensive puja pacifies all nine planets to remove doshas causing obstacles in life. It ensures harmony and success across all areas.
poojas.important_note: Provide birth chart for personalized rituals

poojas.title: Chandra Shanti Pooja
poojas.subtitle: To pacify the Moon’s malefic effects
poojas.description: This puja mitigates the Moon’s negative influence, which causes emotional instability and mental unrest. It invokes Chandra Dev for peace and clarity.
poojas.important_note: Wear white clothing during puja

poojas.title: Budh Graha Shanti
poojas.subtitle: To pacify Mercury’s malefic effects
poojas.description: This puja neutralizes Mercury’s negative influence, which affects communication, intellect, and business. It invokes Budh Dev for clarity and success.
poojas.important_note: Wear green clothing during puja

poojas.title: Guru Graha Shanti
poojas.subtitle: To pacify Jupiter’s malefic effects
poojas.description: This puja mitigates Jupiter’s negative influence, which can cause financial losses and lack of wisdom. It invokes Guru Dev for prosperity and knowledge.
poojas.important_note: Wear yellow clothing during puja

poojas.title: Surya Shanti Pooja
poojas.subtitle: To pacify the Sun’s malefic effects
poojas.description: This puja neutralizes the Sun’s negative influence, which affects authority, health, and vitality. It invokes Surya Dev for confidence and success.
poojas.important_note: Perform at sunrise for maximum effect
poojas.seasonal_offer: Free Surya analysis during Rath Yatra
poojas.priest_qualification: Vedic priests with Surya worship expertise

poojas.title: Chandal Dosh Nivaran Pooja
poojas.subtitle: To mitigate the malefic effects of Guru-Chandal Yoga
poojas.description: This remedial puja addresses the Guru-Chandal Yoga, formed by the conjunction of Jupiter (Guru) and Rahu/Ketu, which can cause financial losses, poor decision-making, and spiritual confusion. Performed with Vedic rituals to restore Jupiter’s benefic influence and neutralize Rahu/Ketu’s malefic effects.
poojas.best_time: Thursday during Jupiter hora or during eclipses
poojas.important_note: Provide birth chart for personalized rituals
procedure: Recitation of Jupiter and Rahu/Ketu mantras
Havan with yellow sandalwood and herbs
Distribution of protective threads and prasad
suitable_for: Individuals facing financial or career blocks
not_suitable_for: Those without Guru-Chandal indications in chart
follow_up: Recite Guru and Rahu/Ketu mantras weekly
Wear yellow sapphire or hessonite if prescribed
poojas.seasonal_offer: Free astrological consultation during Guru Purnima
poojas.priest_qualification: Vedic priests with Jyotish and tantric expertise

poojas.title: Navagraha Shanti Pooja
poojas.subtitle: To balance all nine planetary influences
poojas.description: This comprehensive ritual pacifies all nine planets to remove doshas and ensure success, health, and prosperity in all life aspects.
poojas.best_time: New moon or major planetary transits
poojas.important_note: Provide birth chart for customized rituals

poojas.title: Rudrabhishek Pooja
poojas.subtitle: For divine blessings, health, and obstacle removal
poojas.description: The Rudrabhishek Pooja is a sacred Vedic ritual involving the ceremonial bathing (abhishekam) of the Shiva Lingam with offerings like milk, curd, and honey, accompanied by the chanting of Rudra mantras. It invokes Lord Shiva’s blessings for health, prosperity, and removal of obstacles.
poojas.best_time: Monday, Shravan month, or Maha Shivratri
poojas.frequency: Monthly, annually, or during life challenges
poojas.important_note: Wear white clothing and maintain purity during the ritual
procedure: Abhishekam with panchamrit (milk, curd, honey, ghee, sugar)
Havan with bilva leaves and ghee
Distribution of sacred prasad and vibhuti (holy ash)
suitable_for: Those facing health or career obstacles
not_suitable_for: Those not committed to Vedic ritual discipline
poojas.seasonal_offer: Free vibhuti and rudraksha during Maha Shivratri
poojas.priest_qualification: Shaiva priests trained in Vedic and tantric rituals
poojas.environmental_impact: Eco-friendly materials; bilva leaves and offerings composted post-puja

poojas.title: Maha Mrityunjaya Jaap
poojas.subtitle: For health, longevity, and protection from untimely death
poojas.description: This powerful Vedic chant invokes Lord Shiva to grant health, longevity, and protection from life-threatening situations through mantra recitation.
poojas.important_note: Perform with focused intention for healing

poojas.title: Laghu Rudra Pooja
poojas.subtitle: For divine blessings and obstacle removal
poojas.description: This simplified Rudra puja invokes Lord Shiva to remove obstacles and grant divine blessings for success and spiritual growth.
poojas.important_note: Wear clean white clothes during puja
not_suitable_for: Those not committed to ritual discipline

poojas.title: Maha Rudra Yagya
poojas.subtitle: For supreme blessings and liberation
poojas.description: This grand fire ceremony invokes Lord Shiva’s supreme form to grant liberation, remove karmic obstacles, and bestow divine blessings.
poojas.frequency: Once in a lifetime or during major transitions
poojas.important_note: Requires intense spiritual commitment
poojas.priest_qualification: Shaiva priests with advanced tantric training

poojas.title: Narayan Nagbali Pooja
poojas.subtitle: To appease ancestors and serpent deities
poojas.description: This dual ritual addresses ancestral curses (Narayan Bali) and serpent-related doshas (Nagbali), resolving issues like infertility and family disputes.
poojas.important_note: Perform with family for best results
suitable_for: Those with Pitra or Nag doshas
poojas.priest_qualification: Priests trained in Narayan and Nag rituals

poojas.title: Tripindi Shraddha
poojas.subtitle: To honor ancestors across three generations
poojas.description: This ritual appeases ancestors across three generations, resolving Pitra Dosha and bringing peace, prosperity, and ancestral blessings.
poojas.important_note: Perform with family members
poojas.seasonal_offer: Free ancestral chart analysis during Pitru Paksha

poojas.title: Ganpati Homam
poojas.subtitle: For success and obstacle removal
poojas.description: This fire ceremony invokes Lord Ganesha to remove obstacles and ensure success in new ventures, education, and personal endeavors.
poojas.important_note: Offer modaks to Ganesha during puja
not_suitable_for: Those not committed to ritual discipline
poojas.seasonal_offer: Free Ganesha blessing during Ganesh Chaturthi

poojas.title: Durga Saptashati Path
poojas.subtitle: For protection and victory over obstacles
poojas.description: This recitation of the Durga Saptashati invokes Goddess Durga’s power to remove obstacles, protect from enemies, and grant victory in challenges.
poojas.frequency: During Navratri or when facing challenges
poojas.important_note: Wear red clothing during recitation
not_suitable_for: Those not committed to recitation discipline

poojas.title: Vishnu Sahasranam Path
poojas.subtitle: For divine blessings and prosperity
poojas.description: This recitation of Vishnu’s thousand names invokes Lord Vishnu’s blessings for wealth, protection, and spiritual growth.
poojas.important_note: Offer tulsi leaves to Vishnu during puja
not_suitable_for: Those not committed to recitation discipline
poojas.seasonal_offer: Free Vishnu blessing during Vaikuntha Ekadashi

poojas.title: Aditya Hriday Stotra
poojas.subtitle: For vitality, success, and Sun’s blessings
poojas.description: This recitation of the Aditya Hriday Stotra invokes Lord Surya for vitality, success, and confidence, as per the Ramayana.
poojas.important_note: Perform at sunrise for best results
poojas.seasonal_offer: Free Surya blessing during Rath Yatra

poojas.title: Tail Abhishekam
poojas.subtitle: For health and planetary pacification
poojas.description: This ritual involves offering mustard oil to Lord Shani or other deities to pacify planetary influences and promote health and stability.
poojas.important_note: Use pure mustard oil for abhishekam
poojas.seasonal_offer: Free oil lamp during Shani Jayanti

poojas.title: Hanuman Chalisa Path
poojas.subtitle: For strength, protection, and courage
poojas.description: This recitation of the Hanuman Chalisa invokes Lord Hanuman’s blessings for strength, protection from negativity, and courage to face challenges.
poojas.important_note: Offer bananas to Hanuman during puja
poojas.seasonal_offer: Free Hanuman Chalisa book during Hanuman Jayanti
